Return-Path: <thetford-owner+townlists=stagsmtp.subtextdev.org@lists.valley.net>

	by stagsmtp.subtextdev.org (Postfix) with ESMTPS id 50584A54042
	for <townlists@stagsmtp.subtextdev.org>; Tue, 21 Apr 2015 11:28:46 -0400 (EDT)

	id A84442742C; Tue, 21 Apr 2015 08:28:45 -0700 (PDT)

	(using TLSv1.2 with cipher AECDH-AES256-SHA (256/256 bits))
	(No client certificate requested)
	by groups.electricembers.net (Postfix) with ESMTPS id 902EF27335
	for <thetford@lists.valley.net>; Tue, 21 Apr 2015 08:28:39 -0700 (PDT)

	autolearn=not spam, AWL 0.75, BAYES_00 -1.90, DKIM_SIGNED 0.10,
	DKIM_VALID -0.10, DKIM_VALID_AU -0.10, FREEMAIL_FROM 0.00,
	HTML_MESSAGE 0.00, RCVD_IN_DNSWL_LOW -0.70, RCVD_IN_MSPIKE_H2 -0.28,
	SPF_PASS -0.00)

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7BIT

Greetings from the Thetford Community Discussion List
POSTING RULES: Keep it specific to the town - please sign your posts - limit commercial postings to once a month - keep your tone civil and respectful. Here is the address to post to: thetford@lists.valley.net
More details here: http://lists.valley.net/lists/info/Thetford
---------------------------------


Thank you list serve, from the bottom of our basement! :)

-- 
*Patricia*

Patricia Norton
802.785.4740
*juneberrymusic.com <http://juneberrymusic.com>*
---------------------------
You received this message as a subscriber on the Thetford@lists.valley.net discussion list.

When replying to a posting, if you receive the list digest, use the "Reply to sender" or "Reply to list" links at the end of the individual message. If you receive each posting as a separate email, use your mail program's Reply or Reply-To-All function, as appropriate. Please edit your reply to include only the relevant portions of the original posting, not the entire email.

All Upper Valley-wide posts should be sent ONLY to uppervalley@lists.valley.net.

Anyone can subscribe to this group by sending a blank message to
Thetford-subscribe@lists.valley.net.
To be removed from this list, send a blank message to
Thetford-unsubscribe@lists.valley.net.
Miscellaneous questions or comments may be forwarded directly to the moderator of this ListServe at: Thetford-request@lists.valley.net

For the list homepage with posting guidelines and instructions for changing your subscription options, visit http://lists.valley.net/lists/info/Thetford. The archives with all previous messages posted to this list can be found at http://lists.valley.net/lists/arc/Thetford.

This discussion list is provided at no cost by Vital Communities, a regional nonprofit organization based in White River Junction, Vermont, working to engage citizens, organizations, and communities in creating solutions to our region's challenges. To learn more, go to www.vitalcommunities.org.


--001a113deff2ff3cc205143db18d
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7BIT
